website_summaries.verdict: A simple, affordable self-stirring mug that is ideal for anyone who wants a simple mug without any dominating graphics.
pros: Stands out for its basic stainless steel design
12-ounce capacity and spill-preventing lid make it a good option for commuters
Easily mixes hot chocolate or other powder-based drinks

customer_reviews.title: Broken and bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working 2 days after using. Tried contacting seller and did not receive a response. If you want a product like this...choose a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Smoosh

customer_reviews.title: Love it but it stopped working on day 1
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting to get this mug because I have one back home but it’s not the same quality at all. I gave it to my husband as a small gift and on day 1, it didn’t work after a few hours. I’m so frustrated because I love mugs, I recently moved to my apartment so I don’t have many kitchen appliances so this one is a huge disappointment :(
customer_reviews.author: Ju Merrill

customer_reviews.title: It's great BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought over 5 over the last 3 years and love the idea of well stirred coffee, and foaming. But the travel mug battery department does not hold the batteries tight so it does not work till open and fidget. The cup lid has a habit of splitting down to he center often, and customer service doesn't reply to your enquiry at times. Cup still looks good and keeps coffee hot but the novelty of the stir is lost with remorse.
customer_reviews.author: lucille sayers

customer_reviews.title: Great for gifting kids or adults
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. There is only one thing that could make it better and that’s if it had a metal interior which would keep the drink hot longer. Otherwise awesome and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Thibado

customer_reviews.title: Did not last.
customer_reviews.text: It only lasted 3 months of daily use. Ind you it was keto coffee with oils. I thought this was better than buying a frother. I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: SarahAstrid

customer_reviews.title: Overall okay but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely a cool product, However when I opened it, it looks used, it is scratched, I am kind of grossed out by it. It is battery operated so it can be tricky to wash. So overall, I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My bf new favorite coffee mug! Batteries seem to die quickly but he loves this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gag gift but I ended up buying 2 because they work so good and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Bubba M

customer_reviews.title: Not a good mug
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy used once and washed it , it broke wouldn’t get
customer_reviews.author: steven longoria

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more and paid closer attention. The inside is made of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE - It works well. Do not fill up the cup
customer_reviews.text: I tried 2 different sets of new batteries and the cup still will not work. I am waiting on a refund or something. I returned the broken cup, received the new one and it works just GREAT! I will update the stars from 2 to 4
customer_reviews.author: Ms Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Batteries only last a day or two
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great idea, but I can only use it once or twice before needing to change the batteries! It's horrible. I probably won't use it because I just don't want to change the batteries that much. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Do not buy. not able to keep water/ moisture out of battery port. Bottom cap covering battery was loose and falls off if you shake cup exposing batteries.
customer_reviews.author: sjl

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would repurchase
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved it and it’s actually easy to clean. The quality is great for the price point and the motor is strong but not too strong
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cup! It makes drinking my keto fat coffee so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: jenny smith

customer_reviews.title: To much fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: To much fun to use. It spins so fast it froths up your coffee
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money you pay and doesn't work .
customer_reviews.text: DO JOT GET THIS ITEM! I got this as a birthday present and liked it so much I ordered it as a present for my mother. But just after a month of use (only using it once a week for a month) it completely stopped working. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for coffee lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Overall very pleased with this mug! Bought it for my husband and he loves that it makes his coffee so frothy! He says it tastes fantastic! The only thing I worry about is recently it stopped mixing but then it worked again randomly. Not sure why but at least it works now! Great price too! Highly recommend for any coffee lover!
customer_reviews.author: HalesComet

product_meta.title: Evelots Self Stirring Coffee Mug-Tea-Juice-Travel-12 ounces-Stainless Steel
